alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 9:11AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very cold temperatures and wind chills can lead to hypothermia if proper clothing is not worn.
info.instruction: Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. While the wintry precipitation has ended, icy conditions will persist on some bridges for another few hours. Avoid travel if possible. Continue to exercise extreme caution if you must go out, especially if you have to cross any bridges.
